text: beshak vah hamaaree baaragaah mein bade jhukane vaale the aur (ai rasool) hamaare bandon mein ibraaheem aur isahaaq aur beshak vah (hamaaree baaragaah mein) bade jhukane vaale the aur (ai rasool) hamaare bandon mein ibaraaheem aur isahaaq aur yaakoob ko yaad karo jo kuvat aur baseerat vaale the
